entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:09 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of snow. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
